title: Smart Data Models - GovSteam1
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Steam turbine governor model, based on the GovSteamIEEE1 model  (with optional deadband and nonlinear valve gain added).

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovSteam1

db1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intentional deadband width (db1).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

db2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Unintentional deadband (db2).  Unit = MW.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

eps.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intentional db hysteresis (eps).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain valve position point 1 (GV1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain valve position point 2 (GV2).  Typical Value = 0.4. Default: 0.0

gv3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain valve position point 3 (GV3).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

gv4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain valve position point 4 (GV4).  Typical Value = 0.6. Default: 0.0

gv5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain valve position point 5 (GV5).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

gv6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain valve position point 6 (GV6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor gain (reciprocal of droop) (K) (>0).  Typical Value = 25. Default: 0.0

k1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of HP shaft power after first boiler pass (K1).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

k2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of LP shaft power after first boiler pass (K2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of HP shaft power after second boiler pass (K3).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

k4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of LP shaft power after second boiler pass (K4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of HP shaft power after third boiler pass (K5).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

k6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of LP shaft power after third boiler pass (K6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k7.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of HP shaft power after fourth boiler pass (K7).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k8.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of LP shaft power after fourth boiler pass (K8).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

pgv1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain power value point 1 (Pgv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain power value point 2 (Pgv2).  Typical Value = 0.75. Default: 0.0

pgv3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain power value point 3 (Pgv3).  Typical Value = 0.91. Default: 0.0

pgv4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain power value point 4 (Pgv4).  Typical Value = 0.98. Default: 0.0

pgv5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain power value point 5 (Pgv5).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

pgv6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain power value point 6 (Pgv6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum valve opening (Pmax) (> Pmin).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

pmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum valve opening (Pmin) (>=0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

sdb1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intentional deadband indicator. true = intentional deadband is applied false = intentional deadband is not applied. Typical Value = true. Default: False

sdb2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Unintentional deadband location. true = intentional deadband is applied before point `A` false = intentional deadband is applied after point `A`. Typical Value = true. Default: False

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor lag time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor lead time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Valve positioner time constant (T3(>0).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Inlet piping/steam bowl time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

t5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of second boiler pass (T5).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

t6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of third boiler pass (T6).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

t7.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of fourth boiler pass (T7).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

uc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum valve closing velocity (Uc) (<0).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = -10. Default: 0.0

uo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum valve opening velocity (Uo) (>0).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

valve.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear valve characteristic. true = nonlinear valve characteristic is used false = nonlinear valve characteristic is not used. Typical Value = true. Default: False
